SELECT MALL.MALL_SEQ_PAY_WX_NOTIFY.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MALL.MALL_TB_PAY_WX_NOTIFY ( ID, SIGN_TYPE, INPUT_CHARSET, SIGN, TRADE_MODE, TRADE_STATE, PARTNER, BANK_TYPE, BANK_BILLNO, TOTAL_FEE, FEE_TYPE, NOTIFY_ID, TRANSACTION_ID, OUT_TRADE_NO, ATTACH, TIME_END, TRANSPORT_FEE, PRODUCT_FEE, DISCOUNT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER, APP_ID, TIME_STAMP, NONCE_STR, OPEN_ID, APP_SIGNATURE, IS_SUBSCRIBE, STATE ) VALUES ( #id#, #signType#, #inputCharset#, #sign#, #tradeMode#, #tradeState#, #partner#, #bankType#, #bankBillno#, #totalFee#, #feeType#, #notifyId#, #transactionId#, #outTradeNo#, #attach#, #timeEnd#, #transportFee#, #productFee#, #discount#, sysdate, sysdate, #modifyUser#, #appId#, #timeStamp#, #nonceStr#, #openId#, #appSignature#, #isSubscribe#, 'U' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT t.id, t.app_id AS appId, t.open_id AS openId, t.transaction_id AS transactionId, t.out_trade_no AS outTradeNo FROM MALL.MALL_TB_PAY_WX_NOTIFY t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.out_trade_no = #outTradeNo#
